div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1701 Delta, 1927-1928 Burial: c. 200-180 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 24 AR Alexander III: 6 late post. tetradr. (Assus ?, Temnus, Mytilene, Erythrae, unc. Asia Minor with bucranium symbol, Heracleia) Antigonus Gonatas: 10 tetradr. (as SNG- Cop. 1199 [2], 1200 [1], 1201 [4], 1202 [2], with trident symbol [1]) Lysimachus: 1 late post. tetradr. (Byzan- tium) Ptolemy I: 2 tetradr. (Alexander hd./ Athena) Ptolemy V: 5 tetradr. Disposition: New York 8 (Antigonus 2, Lysimachus 1, Alexander 5) Partial list by C. T. Seltman in ANS
